ygData.subject: RE: Skill Caps
ygData.msgSnippet: no perhaps not a petition, i used the wrong wording there.  all i meant was possibly a follow-up letter to GZ from the bards list with the skill cap issue.
ygData.messageBody:
no perhaps not a petition, i used the wrong wording there. all i meant was
possibly a follow-up letter to GZ from the bards list with the skill cap
issue.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L30 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server


> From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>
>
> I don't mean to sound like I'm disagreeing with you (I agree
> 100 pct) - but
> I don't really see the need for a petition. As far as bards
> are concerned -
> who'd vote AGAINST it?
>
> We definitely should start think about sending another GZ
> letter - and this
> belongs on it...
>
> Slyde
